dimension: 57 x 35 x 3 in. (144.78 x 88.9 x 7.62 cm) (irregular)
title: Mortuary Panel
description: three sheets of bark joined and attached to a wood frame construction on back; seated female figure depicted, body bordered by a banded line; fringe border around exterior of panel; hands up at sides; five hoops hanging from each ear; tongue stuck out
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
